channel.title: Algorithms on TMLHB

item.title: The Important Stuff Everyone Misses
item.description: Easy to Overlook these Multivariate Analysis is nothing but regression Logistic regression IS a binomial regression (with logit link), a special case of the Generalized Linear Model. It doesn’t classify anything unless a threshold for the probability is set. Classification is just its application. Stepwise regression is by no means a regression. It’s a (flawed) method of variable selection. OLS is a method of estimation (among others: GLS, TLS, (RE)ML, PQL, etc.
